pullRequest.title: Added support for azure-core ClientOptions in Key Vault client builders.

commit.message: Added support for `ClientOptions` in Key Vault client builders.

nodes.bodyText: Don't need this check.  forEach() will be executed only if there are elements in the list. Update this in other builders too.
This reads a bit odd - Sets the various options to be set...

commit.message: Corrected Javadoc based on PR suggestions.

nodes.bodyText:
Since user might not know what ClientOptions is for , we can explain in java doc more about what user can set with this.
Here is one example of java doc https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/pull/13697/files#diff-063fb5ef000495423cf8b8e2e66f8518R262
same java doc comment like above.
Could we add one test where use set a Header and it gets added to HttpRequest ?

commit.message: More Javadoc changes based on PR comments.
